line_1: Too oft, alas! are Talents misapply'd,
line_2: By Parents Fondness, Ignorance, and Pride.
While Fopling from some title draws his pride,

line_1: How are the powers of genius misapplied?
line_2: Debas'd to servile purposes of pride,
While reason floats on passion's tide:

line_1: But Terrors wait on Talents misapply'd.
line_2: No more their dear-bought Fame wou'd raise their Pride;
To prove a consequence by none denied,
